0:30 Jungkook finished his drawing of what I'm guessing is 2 food containers or burgers. 0:43 J Hope finished his drawing of a happy looking mug. 1:05 Suga finishes drawing a cup with a straw & what looks like a hamburger. 1:35 V finished drawing an animal face (bear is my guess) & a regular face. 2:06 Jin finished drawing a food item & a cup with a straw. 2:55 Jimin holds up his finished drawing of the ARMY (fan) logo & the word ARMY (ARMY is drawn twice) & I noticed V asleep on the couch behind him the entire time he was drawing. 3:50 RM finished his drawing. It's a circle (or sun) with writing inside it, heart with LY inside (LY stands for Love Yourself which was era before Map of the Soul: Persona. LY era  music videos started with DNA & Mic Drop in 2017, ended with Airplane pt 2 Japanese Version: 2018). His drawing also has a cup with a straw, what looks like it could be a popsocket (a phone grip), a really small hamburger, and some hearts.
